recipe.title: Green Salad with Miso-Ginger
ingredients: 1/2 English hothouse cucumber, halved lengthwise, seeded, thinly sliced crosswise
1 large green onion, sliced on diagonal
instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients in small bowl. Slowly whisk in oil. Combine mixed greens, cucumber, carrot, and onion in large bowl. Toss with dressing to coat and serve.
Combine first 6 ingredients in small bowl. Slowly whisk in oil.
Combine mixed greens, cucumber, carrot, and onion in large bowl. Toss with dressing to coat and serve.
